column5: This designer-like penthouse level pad is located in the heart of Greenway Plaza. Close to Galleria, Medical Center, and downtown, this bright open concept apartment offers comfort, elegance, and plenty of amenities for you to enjoy a true retreat in the middle of the city. Whether you are here traveling for business or pleasure, the attention to detail, convenient location, and comfort of our apartment will make you feel right at home.
column8: Designer-like pad in Greenway Plaza w/ great views
